Name: Grass Pledge
Effect: Area Move. Reduce the Dexterity of those Affected. This Effect Targets the Battlefield: Entry Hazard. Reduce by 1 the Dexterity of Targets that enter the Battlefield. Pokémon with Immunity to Ground-Type Moves are not Affected.
Description: The Pokémon chants to invoke the power of grass. Its pledge is heard and then soil trembles and the ground crumbles as vegetation rises to grapple anyone in the field.
